LauncherLocalization.PWIsAlreadyRunning: ParaWorld is already running. Start PWKiller?
LauncherLocalization.LauncherIsAlreadyRunning: This programm is already running. Please close the running version first!
LauncherLocalization.ResetSettings: This will reset your Settings.cfg file, and some saved data (like last IP addresses) will be lost. Do you really want to continue?
LauncherLocalization.ResetSettingsSuccess: Replaced Settings.cfg with Settings_SSSS_backup.cfg. Some options might have been reset to an old state!
LauncherLocalization.OverwriteBackup: Backup file already exists. Overwrite backup file?
LauncherLocalization.BackupCreated: Created Settings_SSSS_backup.cfg from Settings.cfg. This one will be used when settings.cfg becomes corrupt.
LauncherLocalization.SettingsMissing: Settings.cfg not found. If you have never run ParaWorld on this system before, you must run it first to create the necessary files.
LauncherLocalization.BPMissing: BoosterPack is not installed, please install it first. You can download it from Para-Welt.com or ParaWorld ModDB.
LauncherLocalization.SwitchSSSError: Failed to switch server side scripts.
LauncherLocalization.AskSettingsBackup: Do you want to try to use the backup file?

PWKillerLocalization.PWKillerTitleText: If ParaWorld crashes or does not terminate, press this button!
